abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32681537, pmid32669014, pmid32673193, pmid32681309, pmid32681559, pmid32673303, pmid32687598, pmid32671381, pmid32681308, pmid32681673, pmid32681771, pmid32668831, pmid32672844, pmid32681497, pmid32673190, pmid32665655, pmid32669150, pmid32672843, pmid32628040, pmid32667257, pmid32660668
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.21
